subject: An administrative assistant to
body:
An administrative assistant to perform various administrative tasks like making or receiving payment and sending gifts, keeping record and processing paperwork when necessary with a good weekly pay is needed
,  please find the position and some basic information below.
Position: Personal Assistant
Type: Part-Time Job. 
Pay:$300-400.00 weekly.
Allowance of $50.
Hours: Average of 11hrs weekly
This position will be home-based and flexible part time job, you can be working from home, School or any location.
Customer care

subject: Re: An administrative assistant to
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am interested in the position you have mentioned. I have experience in handling various tasks and I am confident that I can perform the duties as required. 

Could you please provide more details about the job, such as the specific tasks involved, working hours, and payment terms? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maureen

subject: Re: An administrative assistant to
body:
Thank you for your message and sorry for the late response. There is a
slight issue with positioning due to the high volume of applicants.

  This is a flexible part-time job where you determine how much you work,
and best of all, it won't disrupt your other schedules and you'll spend
less money outside the home.

   All you need to do for now is always check your mail for instructions
you should follow whenever you receive mail on my behalf.

    Please confirm your information to create a file in your name.

First and last name:

Address:

Personal cell phone:

E-mail:

Location:

Regard
